com.enjin.enjincoin.sdk.service.notifications

Interface NotificationsService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsynchronousNotificationsService

    public interface NotificationsService
extends AsynchronousNotificationsService
    A notification service interface.

      Returns whether or not a channel is open for the specified identity id.
      void listenForLink(java.math.BigInteger identityId)
      Opens a channel for the specified identity id, allowing listeners to receive link events for that identity.

      Removes a listener.

      boolean start()

      void stopListeningForLink(java.math.BigInteger identityId)
      Closes a channel for the specified identity id, preventing listeners from receiving link events for that identity.

        Starts the notification service.
        Returns:
        true if started, else false.

        Returns:

      • stopListeningForLink

      • isListeningForLink

        boolean isListeningForLink(java.math.BigInteger identityId)
        Returns whether or not a channel is open for the specified identity id.
        Parameters:
        identityId - the identity id.
        Returns:
        true if listening, else false.
